column1: —Sé qué día es hoy —canturreó Dudley, acercándosele con andares de pato.
column2: -I know what day it is," Dudley crooned, waddling over to him.

column1: Harry entró de puntillas en su dormitorio, cerró la puerta y se echó en la cama.
column2: Harry tiptoed into his bedroom, closed the door and lay down on the bed.

column1: —¡Mamaaaaaaá! —vociferó Dudley, dando traspiés al salir a toda pastilla hacia la casa—, ¡mamaaaaaaá!
column2: -Mamaaaaaaaaah! -Dudley yelled, stumbling backwards as he rushed towards the house, "mamaaaaaaaaaaah!
